definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row

sentences.english: You can invert A if the determinant of A is not equal to zero?
The actual formula is obtained by expanding the determinant.
sentences.chinese: 真正的式子是展開了這些行列式之後得到的。
它是一個小一點點的行列式。

sentences.english: This paper also represents some new results on upper bounds for the determinants of nonnormal matrices.
sentences.chinese: 本文還給出若干非正規陣的行列式新的上界估計式。

sentences.english: It post the superiority of the number two theorems schur on the calculation of the symmetric determinant.
sentences.chinese: 揭示它們在某些對稱行列式計算上的優越性。

sentences.english: The determinant of a matrix real quick?
sentences.chinese: 快速計算矩陣行列式的辦法？

sentences.english: But, of course, there's one condition, which is that the determinant of a matrix has to be nonzero.
sentences.chinese: 但有個條件，矩陣的行列式非零。

sentences.english: Then, we take that entry, multiply it by that determinant but put a minus sign.
sentences.chinese: 然後是這項，乘以這個的行列式，但要添上個負號。

sentences.english: See, that is really a completely perverted use of a determinant notation.
sentences.chinese: 對行列式符號的使用完全反常。

sentences.english: And then, we will divide by the determinant of A.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們要用行列式A來除。

sentences.english: If you transpose a matrix, that doesn't change the determinant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你轉置一個矩陣，這將不會改變它的行列式。

sentences.english: Its determinant will be obtained by doing an expansion with respect to, well, your favorite.
sentences.chinese: 它的行列式，可以用展開法求，依照你的偏好。

sentences.english: Construct a determinant function to popularize Cauchy theorem of mean.
sentences.chinese: 構造一行列式函數將柯西中值定理推廣。

sentences.english: The concept of the near determinant over non - commutative ring is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 在非交換環上，介紹擬行列式的概念。

sentences.english: Properties of the electric network determinants are throughly investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文所述爲對於電網絡行列式各種性質之徹底探討。

sentences.english: But, in NumPy an array is basically a matrix.
sentences.chinese: 但是在NumPy中，array代表的是行列式。
